title: bring back general discussion
body: this new beta boards is good for certain subjects about the game, i prefer the normal forums rather than this. Why cant we have both?

replies.body:
Isn't boards just forums with a different skin and some extra features?

I miss the forms, sure.

But purely nostalgia.

Why is everyone so butthurt, pls splain
The boards are better for discussion. Stop whingeing.

The Reason which is most plausible for not being able to have both, and I quote this directly from a comment by Ghosthree3 back on the forums is:

"Because then no one would use boards and Riot's resources will be wasted."

The Link to that thread is here if anyone cares to read. A good thread I might add.
